title: Breaking Update
description: Data concerning a (potential) breaking dependency update

url.description: The URL of the GitHub pull request introducing the breaking update

project.description: The name of the repository containing the breaking update

commit.description: The commit hash of the commit introducing the breaking update

createdAt.description: The date and time when the breaking update pull request was created

dependencyGroupID.description: The group ID of the updated dependency

dependencyArtifactID.description: The artifact ID of the updated dependency

previousVersion.description: The version of the dependency before the update

newVersion.description: The version of the dependency after the update

versionUpdateType.description: The type of change between dependency version, following the SemVer terminology

type.description: The type of user that introduced the breaking update

reproductionStatus.description: The current status of the process to reproduce the breaking update locally

analysis.description: The analysis of any local reproduction attempts
